oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Environmental impact analysis of Dudhganga Dam in India - a multi-temporal remote sensing approach
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NAGARAJAN, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: gis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Surface-cover status of the catchment, reservoir and dam site, before, during and after the completion of a water resources project, plays a vital role in an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA). Orbital satellite data, along with theme and site-based information, were used in an EIA of Dudhganga Dam in India. The collection and analysis of these data in the monitoring of on-going projects is highlighted in this study.
